cmd_admins_description: Show a list with the chat administrators.
cmd_html_description: Formats the provided text with the HTML syntax.
html_usage: Usage: /html <b>text</b> in <i>html</i> — Formats the provided text with the HTML syntax.
cmd_mark_description: Formats the provided text with the Markdown syntax.
mark_usage: Usage: /mark **text** in __markdown__ — Formats the provided text with the Markdown syntax.
cmd_token_description: Get information from the provided bot token.
cmd_urldecode_description: Encode the provided text with URL-safe encoding.
cmd_urlencode_description: Decode the provided text from URL-safe encoding.
parsebtn_err: You must specify a url and the text of the button, E.g.: /parsebutton https://google.com text.
bug_report_success: The bug has been successfully reported.
bug_report_failed: Error, I couldn't send the bug report to the admins of the bot.
bug_report_empty: You must specify the bug to report, E.g.: /bug your bug.
cmd_donate_description: Get information on how to donate.
donate_info:
If you like the project and want it to continue free and alive, please show your support donating by clicking the link below. Any value is appreciated. Thanks!

https://amanoteam.com/donate
